text: Jun Tsushima (born 1966) is a Japanese politician. He is affiliated with Liberal Democratic Party. He is member of House of Representatives of Japan from Aomori 1st district since December 16, 2012. He previously served as Vice-Minister of Land, Transport, Infrastructure and Tourism and also served as Vice-Minister of Cabinet Office in Third Abe Cabinet. Jun's grandfather Osamu Dazai was a novelist and his father Yuji Tsushima was the member of House of Representatives (Japan), Minister of Health and Welfare and member of Liberal Democratic Party.津島淳オフィシャルサイト His aunt Yūko Tsushima was a novelist like her father. His cousin Kyōichi Tsushima was a member of Democratic Party and member of House of Representatives of Japan from Tohoku Proportional District from 2009 to 2012太宰治 近現代・系図ワールド～津島雄二・津島佑子 ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:People from Aomori Prefecture Category:People from Paris Category:Gakushuin University alumni Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Japan) Category:Living people
title: Jun Tsushima
